title: Strawberry Bellini Recipe
description: Whip up a batch of fruity strawberry bellini cocktails with puréed strawberries and sparkling wine, then serve them for any special occasion.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines European Italian Strawberry Bellini 4.6 (15) 10 Reviews 4 Photos A strawberry bellini is a nice drink for Mother's Day, a brunch, or a shower. Submitted by Helen Updated on July 21, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 4 4 Prep Time: 10 mins Additional Time: 10 mins Total Time: 20 mins Servings: 3 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 3 servings 3 cups strawberries, hulled and sliced ¼ cup confectioners' sugar 1 tablespoon brandy 1 ½ cups chilled sparkling wine 3 large whole strawberries Directions Blend hulled strawberries, confectioners' sugar, and brandy in a blender until smooth. Chill in the refrigerator for 10 minutes. Divide the strawberry mixture among three champagne flutes. Pour 1/2 cup sparkling wine into each flute and stir to combine. Garnish each glass with a whole strawberry. I Made It Print 22 home cooks made it! name: Helen
instructions: Blend hulled strawberries, confectioners' sugar, and brandy in a blender until smooth. Chill in the refrigerator for 10 minutes.;Divide the strawberry mixture among three champagne flutes. Pour 1/2 cup sparkling wine into each flute and stir to combine. Garnish each glass with a whole strawberry.
